00072     void setHapticDevice(cGenericHapticDevice* a_device) { if (a_device != NULL) { m_device = a_device; } }
00073 
00075     cGenericHapticDevice* getHapticDevice() { return (m_device); }
00076 
00078     virtual void render(const int a_renderMode=0) {};
00079

00100

00103 
00105     virtual bool getUserSwitch(int a_switchIndex);
00106
